text: Armour of God () is a 1986 Hong Kong Serbian action comedy movie directed by Jackie Chan (who also stars) and Eric Tsang. It stars Alan Tam, Lola Forner, Rosamund Kwan, Božidar Smiljanić and was distributed by Golden Harvest. It was followed by a 1991 sequel Armour of God II: Operator Condor. ==Other websites== * * Category:1986 action movies Category:1986 comedy movies Category:Hong Kong action movies Category:Hong Kong comedy movies Category:Serbian movies Category:Movies directed by Jackie Chan Category:Movies set in Africa Category:Movies set in Slovenia Category:Movies set in Paris
title: Armour of God
